AMAZING! FUN! THE BEST! AND VALVE!

This game has some out of date graphics but also is quite enjoyable, the single player has a LOT of missions that make you think a lot. The co-op is also very good with about half as many missions but is still quite a lot. The bad thing about co-op is that if your partner is not as bright or is having brain cramps then it will be more difficult, and it might be hard to explain how to solve it if you already figured it out (I am NOT calling out my partner for portal 2). The game is still fun but if you are still used to newwer graphics then these graphics might make you sick, but you get over it quickly. I give it a 83%, and I grade hard. Including all of this I still endorce this game.
This game is good.

This game truly is one of a kind. I have never seen one with such innovative mechanics for its time, mostly referring to how the portals work of course. Probably one of the greatest single player campaign games out there. The test chamber puzzles were well designed and some were pretty challenging and the story was very original and great. Definitley recommend.

El mejor juego de valve en lo que lleva de vida, quien sabe si se lleguen a superar aunque la valla esta demasiado alta con este juego existiendo.

Soundtrack, historia, puzzles, graficos que combinan de forma perfecta.

El modo cooperativo es genial y complementa la historia principal.

Tiene su historieta que conecta este juego con su anterior entrega y, lo mejor de todo, es su modo de crear niveles y compartirlos con la comunidad que lo mantiene vivo a día de hoy.

Lo mejor reitero que pudo haber parido mi gordito gaben

Honestly, this is one of my favorite games. Puzzles, challanges, suspense, and more.
Singleplayer is just amazing. The story is just so well planned and writen.
Multiplayer is okay. You can play with friends or with somebody online which always pairs you up with an 8 year old squeaker.
The workshop is even better. New test chambers made by the community almost daily. You can download Singleplayer and Co-op maps which is also great.
In all, this game is just plain good. No negatives, besides the loud goddamn ear rape intro, please lower the damn volume Valve.
Thank you for helping us help you help us all!

jeu du siécle/20

I only just now have been able to purchase my own copy through Steam, and Portal 2 still holds up even after SEVEN YEARS. The music, the puzzles, the story, character development, everything. I always knew that the core scene was chilling, but it's so much more chilling when you're the actual player; it's extremely immersive just as was the first game. And it's just fascinating how quickly you go from finding GLaDOS grating and harsh to... feeling bad for her. I wonder if Valve will ever make anything else based in Aperture.
You don't even need to be good at puzzles to have fun with this game; it is also very fun with a friend

The puzzles are fun. The dialogue and easter eggs tell an interesting story. Music sets a tone of sci-fi and mystery. Characters are funny. A solid game I would recommend to anyone. Definitely a must-play. Literally the only thing I could find negative about the game is it's short, but if you play the co-op as well, it ends up with over 10 hours of gameplay. I'm pretty sure there's mods to play community levels too.

Sucessor de Portal (AVA), Portal 2 consegue ser ainda melhor que seu antecessor em todos os aspectos. Cenários variados, desafios inovadores e com dificuldade maior, novas mecânicas de jogo, modo co-op, novo personagem adicionado, maior tempo de gameplay, possibilidade de criar mapas para outros players jogarem, maior número de conquistas steam, entre outros que podem ser percebidos ao jogar. 
Para quem gostou de Portal, certamente gostará desse pelos motivos acima listados, e para quem está pensando em comprar o 2 sem jogar o 1, até pode... Porém seria mais interessante jogar o primeiro também para ir pegando o jeito da coisa.
                                                                                  
  10/10
Melhor jogo da historia da humanidade !!!!

去年打折的时候入手的，今年才来写测评，不禁有些惭愧。没有玩过1 但是剧情上感觉并不影响理解。不得不佩服v社和创意工坊的大佬们的脑洞，仅通过一把简单的传送枪就能创造出各种各样千奇百怪的关卡。流程不长不短，难度的话对于我这种无脑玩家来说有些还是要多思考一会的（才不会告诉你第八章我卡了快一个小时呢）。剧情方面很棒，环环相扣的，两个ai也萌的很（GLADOS我老婆！） 。游戏性来讲，满分十分，我给20分，10分给单机，10 分给联机，剧情通关了这个游戏就通关了吗？不，游戏才刚刚开始。快拉上好基友一起去创意工坊体验一下世界各地玩家的脑洞吧，两个人四个传送门，八倍的快乐，花上个十几二十分钟和基友一起解出来一个谜题真的成就感满满。总之，买吧，里面有无穷的快乐！

Я влюбился в GlaDOS. Ее диалоги во второй части стали более насыщенными юмором, обидами на Челл, переживаниями...

  Великолепная игра. Это шедевр. Первая часть Portal после второй кажется короткой "демкой". Все понравилось, кроме конца восьмой главы, где я "застрял" и не мог полтара часа пройти кусок локации, в итоге подсмотрел письменное прохождение на stopgame.ru. Там решение задачи немного выходит за рамки обычного gameplay'я игры, не додумался о решении, а другого выхода разработчики не сделали, увы.
  Не хватает в игре того мрачного эмбиента с первой части на фоне прохождения камер, который был полон мистики и нагонял жути. Концовка в игре потрясающая!

  P.S. - ни в коем случае не играйте в данную игру с русской озвучкой, она отвратительна. 
Английская озвучка шедвральна - настоящии эмоции настоящих людей, а не нанятых уставших от жизни русских локализаторов.

  P.S.S. - Уитли, я тебя сразу невзлюбил. Ты паршивый калькулятор с имитацией человеческого голоса, который при знакомстве вызвал лишь отвращение - и если бы не воля сценаристов, если бы был у меня выбор - я бы не нажал на ту кнопку для замены GLaDOS тобою.
